attributes.action: encourage the BBC to screen a Neighbours omnibus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With many of us working the 9 to 5, Monday to Friday we are unable to catch the best television programme currently on the box.  As a result, an omnibus edition of Neighbours would prevent the hard working citizens of the UK from missing an episode.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
